issue.title: downdetector.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://downdetector.com/status/discord/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdowndetector.com%2Fstatus%2Fdiscord%2F) ### Comment > Disqus comments section missing. Caused by Peter Lowe's Blocklist. Using `@@||googletagservices.com/tag/js/gpt.js$domain=downdetector.com` doesn't work but using `@@||referrer.disqus.com^` works instead. Username: `@jimmysofat6864` ### Screenshots

issue.body:
